author: brane
msg: First version of Win32 binary distro generator.
* build/win32/make_dist.py: Generates a Win32 binary distro.
* build/win32/make_dist.conf.template: Template config file for make_dist.py.

author: julianfoad
msg: Capitalise "SSH" when not used as a command name.
Correct "a"/"an" according to pronunciation of the following word.
(In the book we assume that "svn" is pronounced ess-vee-en.)
